verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David the servant of Jehovah, who spake unto Jehovah the words of this song in the day that Jehovah delivered him from the hand of all his enemies, and from the hand of Saul: and he said, I <S%H7355>love<s%> <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah, my <S%H2391>strength<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is my <S%H5553>rock<s%>, and my <S%H4686>fortress<s%>, and my <S%H6403>deliverer<s%>; My <S%H410>God<s%>, my <S%H6697>rock<s%>, in whom I will take <S%H2620>refuge<s%>; My <S%H4043>shield<s%>, and the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>, my high <S%H4869>tower<s%>.
I will <S%H7121>call<s%> upon <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, who is worthy to be <S%H1984>praised<s%>: So shall I be <S%H3467>saved<s%> from mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
The <S%H2256>cords<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H661>compassed<s%> <S%H5158>me<s%>, And the floods of <S%H1100>ungodliness<s%> made me <S%H1204>afraid<s%>.
The <S%H2256>cords<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> were round <S%H5437>about<s%> <S%H4170>me<s%>; The snares of <S%H4194>death<s%> came upon <S%H6923>me<s%>.

In my <S%H6862>distress<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> upon <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And <S%H7768>cried<s%> unto my <S%H430>God<s%>: He <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> out of his <S%H1964>temple<s%>, And my <S%H7775>cry<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him <S%H935>came<s%> into his <S%H241>ears<s%>.

Then the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1607>shook<s%> and <S%H7493>trembled<s%>; The <S%H4146>foundations<s%> also of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7264>quaked<s%> And were <S%H1607>shaken<s%>, because he was <S%H2734>wroth<s%>.

There went <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H6227>smoke<s%> out of his <S%H639>nostrils<s%>, And <S%H784>fire<s%> out of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%>: <S%H1513>Coals<s%> were kindled by <S%H1197>it<s%>.
He <S%H5186>bowed<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H3381>also<s%>, and came down; And thick <S%H6205>darkness<s%> was under his <S%H7272>feet<s%>.
And he <S%H7392>rode<s%> upon a <S%H3742>cherub<s%>, and did <S%H5774>fly<s%>; <S%H1675>Yea<s%>, he soared upon the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7307>wind<s%>.

He <S%H7896>made<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> his <S%H5643>hiding-place<s%>, his <S%H5521>pavilion<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H2824>him<s%>, Darkness of <S%H4325>waters<s%>, thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%> of the <S%H5645>skies<s%>.
At the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> before him his thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%>, <S%H1259>Hailstones<s%> and <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> also <S%H7481>thundered<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, And the Most <S%H5945>High<s%> <S%H5414>uttered<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, <S%H1259>Hailstones<s%> and <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>.
And he sent <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H2671>arrows<s%>, and <S%H6327>scattered<s%> <S%H1300>them<s%>; Yea, lightnings <S%H7232>manifold<s%>, and discomfited <S%H2000>them<s%>.

Then the <S%H650>channels<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%>, And the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> were laid <S%H1540>bare<s%>, At thy <S%H1606>rebuke<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, At the <S%H5397>blast<s%> of the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of thy <S%H639>nostrils<s%>.
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> from on <S%H4791>high<s%>, he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4871>me<s%>; He drew me out of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>.
He <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from my <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H341>enemy<s%>, And from them that <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H553>me<s%>; For they were too mighty for me.
They came <S%H6923>upon<s%> me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H343>calamity<s%>; But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was my <S%H4937>stay<s%>.
He brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> also into a large <S%H4800>place<s%>; He <S%H2502>delivered<s%> <S%H2654>me<s%>, because he delighted in me.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> me according to my <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>; According to the <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%> hath he recompensed <S%H7725>me<s%>.
For I have <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And have not wickedly <S%H7561>departed<s%> from my <S%H430>God<s%>.
For all his <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> were before <S%H5493>me<s%>, And I put not away his statutes from <S%H2708>me<s%>.
I was also <S%H8549>perfect<s%> with <S%H8104>him<s%>, And I kept myself from mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

Therefore hath <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7725>recompensed<s%> me according to my <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, According to the <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%> in his <S%H5869>eyesight<s%>.
With the <S%H2623>merciful<s%> thou wilt show thyself <S%H2616>merciful<s%>; With the <S%H8549>perfect<s%> <S%H1399>man<s%> thou wilt show thyself <S%H8549>perfect<s%>;
With the <S%H1305>pure<s%> thou wilt show thyself <S%H1305>pure<s%>; And with the <S%H6141>perverse<s%> thou wilt show thyself <S%H6617>froward<s%>.
For thou wilt <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>; But the <S%H7311>haughty<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%> thou wilt bring <S%H8213>down<s%>.
For thou wilt <S%H215>light<s%> my <S%H5216>lamp<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5050>lighten<s%> my <S%H2822>darkness<s%>.
For by thee I run <S%H7323>upon<s%> a <S%H1416>troop<s%>; And by my <S%H430>God<s%> do I leap <S%H1801>over<s%> a <S%H7791>wall<s%>.

As for <S%H410>God<s%>, his <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H8549>perfect<s%>: The <S%H565>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H6884>tried<s%>; He is a <S%H4043>shield<s%> unto all them that take refuge in <S%H2620>him<s%>.
For who is <S%H433>God<s%>, <S%H1107>save<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>? And who is a <S%H6697>rock<s%>, <S%H2108>besides<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>,
The <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H247>girdeth<s%> me with <S%H2428>strength<s%>, And <S%H5414>maketh<s%> my <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8549>perfect<s%>?
He <S%H7737>maketh<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> like <S%H355>hinds<s%>' <S%H5975>feet<s%>: And setteth me upon my high <S%H1116>places<s%>.
He <S%H3925>teacheth<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%>; So that mine <S%H2220>arms<s%> do <S%H5181>bend<s%> a <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H5154>brass<s%>.

Thou hast also <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H4043>shield<s%> of thy <S%H3468>salvation<s%>; And thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> hath holden me <S%H5582>up<s%>, And thy <S%H6037>gentleness<s%> hath made me <S%H7235>great<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H7337>enlarged<s%> my <S%H6806>steps<s%> under <S%H7166>me<s%>, And my feet have not <S%H4571>slipped<s%>.
I will <S%H7291>pursue<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> <S%H7725>them<s%>; Neither will I turn again till they are <S%H3615>consumed<s%>.
I will <S%H4272>smite<s%> them <S%H3201>through<s%>, so that they shall not be able to <S%H6965>rise<s%>: They shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> under my <S%H7272>feet<s%>.
For thou hast <S%H247>girded<s%> me with <S%H2428>strength<s%> unto the <S%H4421>battle<s%>: Thou hast <S%H3766>subdued<s%> under me those that rose up against <S%H6965>me<s%>.
Thou hast also <S%H5414>made<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> turn their <S%H6203>backs<s%> unto <S%H6789>me<s%>, That I might cut off them that hate <S%H8130>me<s%>.
They <S%H7768>cried<s%>, but there was none to <S%H3467>save<s%>; Even unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, but he answered them <S%H6030>not<s%>.
Then did I <S%H7833>beat<s%> them small as the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%>; I did cast them <S%H7324>out<s%> as the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets<s%>.

Thou hast <S%H6403>delivered<s%> me from the <S%H7379>strivings<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>; Thou hast <S%H7760>made<s%> me the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>: A <S%H5971>people<s%> whom I have not <S%H3045>known<s%> shall serve <S%H5647>me<s%>.
As soon as they <S%H8088>hear<s%> of me they shall <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H1121>me<s%>; The foreigners shall submit themselves unto <S%H3584>me<s%>.
The <S%H1121>foreigners<s%> shall fade <S%H5034>away<s%>, And shall come <S%H2727>trembling<s%> out of their close <S%H4526>places<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>; And <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be my <S%H6697>rock<s%>; And <S%H7311>exalted<s%> be the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>,
Even the <S%H410>God<s%> that executeth <S%H5414>vengeance<s%> for <S%H1696>me<s%>, And subdueth peoples under <S%H5971>me<s%>.

He <S%H6403>rescueth<s%> me from mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>; <S%H7311>Yea<s%>, thou liftest me up above them that rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against <S%H5337>me<s%>; Thou deliverest me from the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.
Therefore I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah, among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, And will sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.

Great <S%H1431><s%> <S%H3444>deliverance<s%> giveth he to his <S%H4428>king<s%>, And <S%H6213>showeth<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> to his <S%H4899>anointed<s%>, To <S%H1732>David<s%> and to his <S%H2233>seed<s%>, <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
